New Records: Virat Kohli passed Sachin Tendulkar's record of most ODI centuries.
Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took seven wickets for India.
Kane Williamson's dismissal after reaching 52 was dropped by Shami.
Daryl Mitchell reached 100 from 85 deliveries but was eventually dismissed for 134.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed pride in the team's performance and the record-breaking century.
Kane Williamson praised India's performance and acknowledged their dominance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand's dream of World Cup success ended with a 70-run defeat.
India advanced to their first final at the tournament since 2011.
